org.daisy.streamline.api.media

Interface ModifiableFileSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileSet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileSet

    public interface ModifiableFileSet
extends FileSet
    Provides a modifiable file set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean internalize(java.lang.String path)
      Internalizes the specified file set path by moving the resource from its current location into the file set.
      void internalizeAllCopy()
      Copies all external resources into this file set.
      void internalizeBelow(java.nio.file.Path base)
      Moves all resources located in the specified directory into this file set's base location.
      boolean internalizeCopy(java.lang.String path)
      Internalizes the specified file set path by copying the original resource into the file set.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.daisy.streamline.api.media.FileSet

        getBaseFolder, getFormatIdentifier, getManifest, getManifestPath, getResource, getResource, getResourceForKey, getResourcePaths, isManifest, streamExternal

    • Method Detail

      • internalizeAllCopy

        void internalizeAllCopy()
        Copies all external resources into this file set. The resources in this file set will be updated with their new locations. For the copy to succeed, the path to the new location must be a descendant of FileSet.getBaseFolder(). For example, if the resource path starts with .., it will not be processed. See also, internalizeBelow(Path).

      • internalizeBelow

        void internalizeBelow(java.nio.file.Path base)
        Moves all resources located in the specified directory into this file set's base location. Resources in this file set will be update with the new locations. For the move to succeed, the path to the new location must be a descendant of FileSet.getBaseFolder(). For example, if the resource path starts with .., it will not be processed. See also, internalizeAllCopy().
        Parameters:
        base - the directory

      • internalizeCopy

        boolean internalizeCopy(java.lang.String path)
        Internalizes the specified file set path by copying the original resource into the file set. For the copy to succeed, the path to the new location must be a descendant of FileSet.getBaseFolder(). For example, if the resource path starts with .., it will not be processed. See also, internalize(String).
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        true if the file was successfully internalized, false otherwise

      • internalize

        boolean internalize(java.lang.String path)
        Internalizes the specified file set path by moving the resource from its current location into the file set. For the move to succeed, the path to the new location must be a descendant of FileSet.getBaseFolder(). For example, if the resource path starts with .., it will not be processed. See also, internalizeCopy(String).
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        true if the file was successfully internalized, false otherwise
